product_name: bareMineralsSKINLONGEVITY Cushion Cloud Gentle Foaming Cleanser
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganbareMinerals SKINLONGEVITY Cushion Cloud Gentle Foaming Cleanser is a gentle cream-to-foam cleanser with exclusive Mineral Herb Complex that deeply cleanses, removes makeup and sunscreen, while strengthening skin barrier*.
details: DetailsBenefitsThis luxurious cleanser deeply purifies without stripping moisture from skin immediately and after one day**, leaving skin smoother and more nourished after one use.It improves hydration by 18% immediately*, while enhancing barrier function immediately and overtime*, brightness, and clarity both immediately and over time*.Gluten-free + formulated without synthetic fragrance, PEGs and moreDermatologist-testedSuitable for all skin types and tonesSafe for sensitive skinResearch Results100% of users said cleanser leaves skin feeling clean and fresh​ after one day100% of users said cleanser feels non-irritating and gentle on skin​ after one day83% of users said cleanser washes off makeup, dirt, and SPF​ after one week of use*Based on an independent clinical study​**Based on an independent consumer study​Key IngredientsMineral Herb Complex- Mineral-rich plant-based complex to help combat the signs of agingMineral-Rich Sea Salts- Help refine, purify and gently cleanseRosemary Extract- Rich in anxidants to protect skin from early signs agingItem 2640404How To UseApply to damp face and work into a rich lather. Rinse well.Start by dampening your face, then apply a small, pearl-sized amount of cleanser to your fingertips.Gently massage it into your skin, working the formula into a rich, creamy lather.Rinse thoroughly and feel refreshed---use twice daily, morning and night, for radiant, glowing skin!IngredientsWater (Aqua/Eau), Palmitic Acid, Stearic Acid, Glycerin, Potassium Hydroxide, Glyceryl Stearate, Myristic Acid, Cocamidopropylamine Oxide, Peucedanum Japonicum Extract, Scutellaria Baicalensis Root Extract, Centella Asiatica Extract, Propanediol, Sambucus Nigra Flower Extract, Polygonum Cuspidatum Root Extract, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Glycyrrhiza Glabra (Licorice) Root Extract, Phenoxyethanol, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Polyacrylate Crosspolymer-6, Sodium Chloride, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Polyquaternium-39, Butylene Glycol, Citric Acid, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Sodium Benzoate.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Apply to damp face and work into a rich lather. Rinse well.Start by dampening your face, then apply a small, pearl-sized amount of cleanser to your fingertips.Gently massage it into your skin, working the formula into a rich, creamy lather.Rinse thoroughly and feel refreshed---use twice daily, morning and night, for radiant, glowing skin!

reviews.headline: Bring back Pure Plush!
reviews.comments: I really miss the Pure Plush cleanser. This new cleanser doesn't make my face as clean. I feel like you have to use so much of it to even get a nice lather.  Why make a new product when the old was fantastic. Ugh!

reviews.headline: Doesn't foam. Irritates rosacea.
reviews.comments: I really miss the PurePlush cleanser BareMinerals used to make. This new cleanser is watery, doesn't foam, does a poor job of cleaning foundation off skin, and has caused my rosacea to flare up. I will not be buying it again.

media.headline: Luxe feeling
media.caption: Shimmery finish and rich, cushiony texture

faceoff_positive.comments:
I've tried countless cleansers over the years, but the SKINLONGEVITY® Cushion Cloud Gentle Foaming Cleanser genuinely stands out. From the first use, I noticed how incredibly soft and cushiony the texture felt. It lathers into the perfect cloud-like foam that feels luxurious without being heavy. As someone with sensitive skin, I'm always hesitant about trying foaming products, but this one proved to be a pleasant surprise — no dryness, no tightness, just clean and balanced skin.

The cleanser is infused with minerals and botanicals that leave my skin feeling refreshed and resilient. I especially appreciate that it doesn't strip away natural oils — something many foaming cleansers tend to do. Instead, my skin feels nourished and smooth. I've been using it both in the morning and at night, and over the past few weeks, I've noticed my complexion looking more radiant and even-toned.

Another bonus: a little goes a long way. Just a pea-sized amount creates a soft lather that removes makeup, sunscreen, and daily impurities with ease. The subtle scent is calming, and the formula rinses clean without any residue. It also layers well with other skincare products, so there's no pilling or irritation when I apply my serums and moisturizers afterward.

The packaging is sleek and hygienic, making it easy to dispense the right amount. I also love that the product is formulated with clean beauty standards in mind — free from harsh chemicals, parabens, and synthetic fragrances.

If you're looking for a gentle but effective daily cleanser that pampers your skin while delivering results, SKINLONGEVITY® Cushion Cloud is worth a try. It's become a staple in my routine, and I'll definitely be repurchasing.
faceoff_positive.headline: A Gentle Glow-Up for My Skin

faceoff_negative.comments:
I received this product for free in exchange for my honest review — and believe me, honesty is what you're getting.

Let's start with the name: Cushion Cloud Gentle Foaming Cleanser. I expected a luxurious, dreamy cloud of foam to whisk away my stress and my sins. Instead, I got a couple bubbles and a weirdly oily finish that made me question if I'd accidentally used a light salad dressing on my face.

Now don't get me wrong — it cleansed, technically. My skin felt soft and hydrated afterward, but it also felt like I needed to go back in with another cleanser to get rid of the weird heaviness it left behind. "Cushion" and "Cloud" are great words for a pillow, but less so for something that should make me feel squeaky clean.

I'm a longtime fan of bareMinerals and have loved a lot of their skincare, but this one just didn't hit the mark. If you have super dry skin and like your cleanser with a little extra richness, this might be your thing. For me, I wanted more foam, less film.

Bottom line: not a total flop, just not my holy grail. A solid "meh".
faceoff_negative.headline: A solid "meh"
